object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.RAN.RRC.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of the RRC in the HNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.RAN.RRC.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the RRC statistics as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.452}}.

parameter.name: AttConnEstab
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of RRC connection establishment attempts by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the cause name= "sum".

parameter.name: FailConnEstab
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of RRC establishment failures by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the cause name= "sum".

parameter.name: SuccConnEstab
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successful RRC establishments by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the cause name= "sum".

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.CN.PSDomain.RAB.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of the Packet Switch RAB in the HNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.CN.PSDomain.RAB.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the RAB statistics in the PS Domain as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.452}}.

parameter.name: AttEstabPS
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of requested RAB in establishment attempts for the PS domain by traffic class. {{list| where each item is defined as the "traffic class name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the traffic class name= "sum".

parameter.name: SuccEstabPS
parameter.description: This measurement provides the total number of successfully established RABs for the PS domain

parameter.name: FailEstabPS
parameter.description: This measurement provides the total number of RABs establishment failures for the PS domain.

parameter.name: RelDropPS
parameter.description: This measurement provides the total number of abnormally released PS RAB connections.

parameter.name: ULNumUserBitsEDCH
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of uplink User Bits for PS RABs related with EDCH above RLC. The average uplink data throughput on EDCH RABs can be derived from this measurement.

parameter.name: ULNumUserBits64K
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of Uplink User Bits for PS RABs with UL 64 kbps data rate. The average uplink data throughput on 64 kbps RABs can be derived from this measurement.

parameter.name: ULNumUserBits128K
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of Uplink User Bits for PS RABs with UL 128 kbps data rate. The average uplink data throughput on 128 kbps RABs can be derived from this measurement.

parameter.name: ULNumUserBits384K
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of Uplink User Bits for PS RABs with UL 384 kbps data rate. The average uplink data throughput on 384 kbps RABs can be derived from this measurement.

parameter.name: DLNumUserBitsHSDPA
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of Downlink User Bits for PS RABs related with HSDPA above RLC. The average downlink data throughput on HSDPA RABs can be derived from this measurement.

parameter.name: DLNumUserBits64K
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of Downlink User Bits for PS RABs (non-HSDPA) with DL 64 kbps data rate above RLC. The average downlink data throughput on 64 kbps RABs (non-HSDPA) can be derived from this measurement.

parameter.name: DLNumUserBits128K
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of Downlink User Bits for PS RABs (non-HSDPA) with DL 128 kbps data rate above RLC. The average downlink data throughput on 128 kbps RABs (non-HSDPA) can be derived from this measurement.

parameter.name: DLNumUserBits384K
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of Downlink User Bits for PS RABs (non-HSDPA) with DL 384 kbps data rate above RLC. The average downlink data throughput on 384 kbps RABs (non-HSDPA) can be derived from this measurement.

parameter.name: LGWNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.CN.PSDomain.RAB.Stats.LGW.{i}.
object.description: This object provides statistics for the Direct User Plane Path between HNB and Local Gateway as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.452}}.

parameter.name: CorrelationID
parameter.description: The value of this parameter is equal to the user plane GGSN TEID that the Gn-SGSN has received or the user plane PDN GW TEID that the S4-SGSN has received. {{bibref|3GPP-TS.25.413}}.

parameter.name: EstabDirectPathLGWAttNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of direct user plane path between HNB and Local GW attempted to setup.

parameter.name: EstabDirectPathLGWSuccNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of direct user plane path between HNB and Local GW successfully established.

parameter.name: EstabDirectPathLGWFailNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of direct user plane path between HNB and Local GW RABs failed to setup by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the cause name= "sum".

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.CN.CSDomain.RAB.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of the Circuit Switch RAB in the HNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.CN.CSDomain.RAB.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the RAB statistics in the CS Domain as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.452}}.

parameter.name: AttEstabCS
parameter.description: This measurement provides the total number of requested RABs in establishment attempts.

parameter.name: FailEstabCS
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of RABs establishment failures for the CS domain.

parameter.name: SuccEstabCS
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully established RABs for the CS domain.

parameter.name: RelDropCS
parameter.description: This measurement provides the total number of dropped RAB connections for service type CS Domain.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.CN.HHO.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of the Hard Handover (HHO) properties in the HNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.CN.HHO.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the HHO statistics as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.452}}.

parameter.name: SuccHnbUmtsIntraFreq
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successful HNB to UMTS macro cell intra frequency hard handovers.

parameter.name: AttHnbUmtsIntraFreq
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted HNB to UMTS macro cell intra frequency hard handovers.

parameter.name: AttHnbUmtsInterFreq
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted HNB to UMTS macro cell inter frequency hard handovers.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.CN.CSDomain.HHO.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of the circuit switch Hard Handover (HHO) in the HNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.UMTS.CN.CSDomain.HHO.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the circuit switch HHO statistics as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.452}}.

parameter.name: Att3GMacroToHnbCSHO
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted 3G Macro to HNB CS handovers.

parameter.name: Succ3GMacroToHnbCSHO
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successful 3G Macro to HNB CS handovers.

parameter.name: Att2GMacroToHnbCSHO
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted 2G Macro to HNB CS handovers.

parameter.name: Succ2GMacroToHnbCSHO
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successful 2G Macro to HNB CS handovers.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.CSG.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of Closed Subscriber Groups (CSG) in the HeNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.CSG.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the LTE RAN CSG statistics as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.453}}.

parameter.name: MeanNbrUsr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the mean number of attached CSG UEs in the HeNB.

parameter.name: AttInboundMobility
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted inbound mobility for UEs to CSG cells or hybrid cells in RRC_CONNECTED mode.

parameter.name: SuccInboundMobility
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successful inbound mobility for UEs to CSG cells or hybrid cells in RRC_CONNECTED mode.

parameter.name: FailedInboundMobility
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of failed successful inbound mobility for UEs to CSG cells or hybrid cells in RRC_CONNECTED mode by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the cause name= "sum".

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.RRC.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of the RRC in the HeNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.RRC.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the RRC statistics as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.453}}.

parameter.name: AttConnEstab
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of RRC connection establishment attempts by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the cause name= "sum".

parameter.name: FailConnEstab
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of RRC establishment failures by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the cause name= "sum".

parameter.name: SuccConnEstab
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successful RRC establishments by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the cause name= "sum".

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.ERAB.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of E-RABs in the HeNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.ERAB.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the E-RAB statistics as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.453}}.

parameter.name: EstabInitAttNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of initial E-RABs attempted to setup by QoS level (QCI). {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: EstabInitSuccNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of initial E-RABs successfully established QoS level (QCI). {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: EstabInitFailNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of initial E-RABs failed to setup by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: EstabAttNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of E-RABs attempted to setup by QoS level (QCI). {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: EstabSuccNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of E-RABs successfully established by QoS level (QCI). {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: EstabFailNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of E-RABs failed to setup by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: RelEnbNbrQCI
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of E-RABs requested to release initiated by HeNB by QCI. {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: RelEnbNbrCause
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of E-RABs requested to release initiated by HeNB by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: LGWNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.ERAB.Stats.LGW.{i}.
object.description: This object provides statistics for the Direct User Plane Path between HeNB and Local Gateway as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.453}}.

parameter.name: CorrelationID
parameter.description: The value of this parameter is equal to the user plane PDN GW TEID (GTP-based S5) or GRE key (PMIP-based S5). {{bibref|3GPP-TS.25.401}}.

parameter.name: EstabDirectPathLGWAttNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of direct user plane path between HeNB and Local GW attempted to setup.

parameter.name: EstabDirectPathLGWSuccNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of direct user plane path between HeNB and Local GW successfully established.

parameter.name: EstabDirectPathLGWFailNbr
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of direct user plane path between HeNB and Local GW E-RABs failed to setup by cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.EPC.HO.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of the Handover (HO) properties in the HeNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.EPC.HO.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the HO statistics as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.453}}.

parameter.name: ToeNBAtt
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted outbound handover to HeNB by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: ToeNBSucc
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successful outbound handover to HeNB by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: ToeNBFail
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of failed outbound handover to HeNB by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: FromeNBAtt
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted inbound handover from HeNB by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: FromeNBSucc
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successful inbound handover from HeNB by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: FromeNBFail
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of failed inbound handover from HeNB by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: ToUtranAtt
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted outbound handover to Utran by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: ToUtranSucc
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successful outbound handover to Utran by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: ToUtranFail
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of failed outbound handover to Utran by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: ToGeranAtt
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted outbound handover to Geran by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: ToGeranSucc
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of successful outbound handover to Geran by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: ToGeranFail
parameter.description: This measurement provides the number of failed outbound handover to Geran by handover cause. {{list| where each item is defined as the "cause name=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.DRB.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of Data Radio Bearers (DRB) in the HeNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.DRB.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the DRB statistics as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.453}}.

parameter.name: PdcpSduBitrateDl
parameter.description: This measurement provides the average cell bit-rate of PDCP SDUs on the downlink. This represents the ingress rate of user plane traffic to the HeNB (via S1) by SAE Bearer QoS level (QCI). {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: PdcpSduBitrateUl
parameter.description: This measurement provides the average cell bit-rate of PDCP SDUs on the uplink. This represents successful transmissions of user plane traffic; control signalling and retransmissions are excluded from this measure. Measurement is by SAE Bearer QoS level (QCI). {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: PdcpSduBitrateDlMax
parameter.description: This measurement provides the maximum cell bit-rate of PDCP SDUs on the downlink. This represents the maximum ingress rate of user plane traffic to the HeNB (via S1). This is a sum counter measured across all QCIs.

parameter.name: PdcpSduBitrateUlMax
parameter.description: This measurement provides the maximum cell bit-rate of PDCP SDUs measured on the uplink. This represents successful transmissions of user plane traffic; control signalling and retransmissions are excluded from this measure. This is a sum counter measured across all QCIs.

parameter.name: PdcpSduDelayDl
parameter.description: This measurement provides the average (arithmetic mean) PDCP SDU delay on the downlink by ERAB Bearer QoS level (QCI). {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: PdcpSduDropRateDl
parameter.description: This measurement provides the fraction of IP packets (PDCP SDUs) which are dropped on the downlink by ERAB Bearer QoS level (QCI). Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. A dropped packet is one whose context is removed from the HeNB without any part of it having been transmitted on the air interface. Packets discarded during handover are excluded from the count. {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: PdcpSduAirLossRateDl
parameter.description: This measurement provides the fraction of IP packets (PDCP SDUs) which are lost (not successfully transmitted) on the downlink air interface by ERAB Bearer QoS level (QCI). Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. A lost packet is one whose context is removed from the HeNB after an attempt has been made to transmit part or all of the packet on the air interface but the whole packet has not been successfully transmittedafter an attempt has been made to transmit part or all of the packet on the air interface but the whole packet has not been successfully transmitted. {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: PdcpSduLossRateUl
parameter.description: This measurement provides the fraction of IP packets (PDCP SDUs) which are lost (not successfully received) on the uplink by ERAB Bearer QoS level (QCI). Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) and only PDCP SDUs that have entered PDCP (and given a PDCP sequence number) are considered. {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: UEActiveDl
parameter.description: This measurement provides the average number of UEs that have user-plane (DTCH) data queued on the downlink by ERAB Bearer QoS level (QCI). {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

parameter.name: UEActiveUl
parameter.description: This measurement provides the average number of UEs that have user-plane (DTCH) data queued on the uplink by ERAB Bearer QoS level (QCI). {{list| where each item is defined as the "QCI level=measurement value"}} The total of all the measurements is provided using the name= "sum".

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.RRU.
object.description: This object provides monitoring of the Radio Resource Usage in the HeNB.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.RAN.RRU.Stats.
object.description: This object provides the RRU statistics as defined in {{bibref|3GPP-TS.32.453}}.

parameter.name: PrbTotDl
parameter.description: This measurement provides the total usage, in {{units}}, of physical resource blocks (PRBs) on the downlink for any purpose.

parameter.name: PrbTotUl
parameter.description: This measurement provides the total usage, in {{units}}, of physical resource blocks (PRBs) on the uplink for any purpose.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.EnergySavings.
object.description: This object provides for the managment of energy savings capabilities in the HeNB.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: This attribute determines whether the energy saving function is enabled or disabled.

parameter.name: State
parameter.description: Specifies the status regarding the energy saving in the cell. This parameter is applicable when the value of {{param|Enable}} is {{true}}.

parameter.name: NotAllowedTimePeriodNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.EnergySavings.ActivationCandidateCellsLoad.
object.description: This object is relevant if the cell acts as a candidate cell. This object indicates the traffic load threshold and the time duration, which are used by distributed energy saving algorithms to allow an ‘original’ cell to enter the energy saving state. Threshold and TimeDuration are applied to the candidate cell(s) which provide coverage backup of an original cell when it is in the energy saving state.

parameter.name: Threshold
parameter.description: PRB usage as a {{units}} {{bibref|3GPP-TS.36.314}}. The threshold applies in the same way for a candidate cell no matter which original cell it will provide backup coverage.

parameter.name: TimeDuration
parameter.description: This parameter indicates how long the traffic in the candidate cell needs to have been below the threshold, in {{units}}, before any original cells which will be provided backup coverage by the candidate cell enters energy saving state.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.EnergySavings.DeactivationCandidateCellsLoad.
object.description: This object is relevant if the cell acts as a candidate cell. This object indicates the traffic load threshold and the time duration which is used by distributed energy saving algorithms to allow a cell to leave the energy saving state. Threshold and time duration are applied to the candidate cell when it provides coverage backup for the cell in energy saving state.

parameter.name: Threshold
parameter.description: PRB usage as a {{units}} {{bibref|3GPP-TS.36.314}}. The threshold applies in the same way for a candidate cell, no matter for which original cell it provides backup coverage.

parameter.name: TimeDuration
parameter.description: This parameter indicates how long the traffic in the candidate cell needs to have been above the threshold, in {{units}}, to wake up one or more original cells which have been provided backup coverage by the candidate cell.

object.name: FAPService.{i}.CellConfig.LTE.EnergySavings.NotAllowedTimePeriod.{i}.
object.description: This object provides a time period for which energy saving is not allowed. This object can be used to prevent a cell entering energy saving state. This object is valid on the specified day(s) and time of every week.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: This attribute determines whether the time period is enabled or disabled.

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: Starting time for this time period formatted as "HH:MM:SS" in UTC.

parameter.name: EndTime
parameter.description: Ending time for this time period formatted as "HH:MM:SS" in UTC.

parameter.name: DaysOfWeek
parameter.description: {{list| that represents the days of the week that are effective for this time period}}
